definition: Spring and Autumn Period (770-476 BC)
spring (season)/gay/joyful/youthful/love/lust/life
surname Chun
autumn/fall/harvest time
surname Qiu
o'clock/time/when/hour/season/period
surname Shi
to substitute/to act on behalf of others/to replace/generation/dynasty/age/period/(historical) era/(geological) eon

sentences.english: As early as in the spring and Autumn period, the island of Zhifu is a famous place.
sentences.chinese: 早在春秋時代，芝罘島就是個有名的地方。

sentences.english: In the Spring and Autumn Period, in the State of Qi there was a man who always let his imagination run away with him.
sentences.chinese: 春秋時代，杞國有一個喜歡胡思亂想的人。

sentences.english: Writing poems was a ritual to express individual's political ideal and ambition in the Spring-and-Autumn Period.
sentences.chinese: 春秋時代，賦詩是政治理想與個人志向的表達方式。

sentences.english: In the Spring and Autumn period, copper and iron chopsticks came into being.
sentences.chinese: 在春秋時代又出現了銅製和鐵製的筷子。

sentences.english: Its origin dates back to the Spring and Autumn Period.
sentences.chinese: 清明節可以追溯到春秋時代。

sentences.english: During Spring&Autumn period, the language of Chu was quite different to the language used in Central plain.
sentences.chinese: 在春秋時代，楚語和中原語言之間有明顯的區別。

sentences.english: In the ring and Autumn period, co er and iron cho ticks came into being.
sentences.chinese: 在春秋時代又出現了銅製和鐵製的筷子。

sentences.english: In the Spring and Autumn Period, Duke Huan of Qi led an army to attack a small state in the north.
sentences.chinese: 春秋時代，齊桓公出徵攻打北方一個小國。

sentences.english: In the Spring and Autumn Period, there was an expert archer.
sentences.chinese: 春秋時代有個人射箭的技術非常高超。

sentences.english: In the Spring and Autumn Period, a man in the State of Song raised monkeys.
sentences.chinese: 春秋時代，宋國有一個人，養了一大羣猴子。

sentences.english: Having seen the crisis appearance of existence on the Spring and Autumn Period, Confucius set his mind on carrying forward Ren to benefit mankind.
sentences.chinese: 面對春秋時代的生存危機現象，孔子有志於弘道濟世。

sentences.english: Spring and Autumn Period in Chinese history is an important period of social transformation.
sentences.chinese: 春秋時代是中國歷史上社會轉型的重要時期。

sentences.english: Bole whose real name is Yang Sun, he is the person Spring and Autumn Period.
sentences.chinese: 第一個被稱作伯樂的人本名孫陽，他是春秋時代的人。

definition: King Gou Jian of Yue (c. 470 BC), sometimes considered one of the Five Hegemons 春秋五霸
Bamboo Annals, early chronicle of Chinese ancient history, written c. 300 BC
Former Han dynasty (206 BC-8 AD), also called 西漢|西汉[Xi1 Han4], Western Han dynasty
Shang Tang (1646-? BC), legendary founder of the Shang Dynasty
Jin Dynasty (265-420)
School of Yin-Yang of the Warring States Period (475-221 BC) founded by Zou Yan 鄒衍|邹衍[Zou1 Yan3]

lit. “Mr. Lü's Spring and Autumn (Annals)”, compendium of the philosophies of the Hundred Schools of Thought 諸子百家|诸子百家[zhu1 zi3 bai3 jia1], compiled around 239 BC under the patronage of Qin Dynasty 秦代[Qin2 dai4] Chancellor Lü Buwei 呂不韋|吕不韦[Lu:3 Bu4 wei2]
Shennong or Farmer God (c. 2000 BC), first of the legendary Flame Emperors, 炎帝[Yan2 di4] and creator of agriculture in China/followers or clan of Shennong 神農|神农[Shen2 nong2]
medical scientist
the Three Su father and sons (referring to Northern Song literati Su Xun 蘇洵|苏洵[Su1 Xun2], Su Shi 蘇軾|苏轼[Su1 Shi4] and Su Zhe 蘇轍|苏辙[Su1 Zhe2])
divination combined with mystical Confucian philosopy, prevalent during the Eastern Han Dynasty (25-220)
to broadcast a time signal

the Book of History, one of the Five Classics of Confucianism 五經|五经[Wu3 jing1], a compendium of documents which make up the oldest extant texts of Chinese history, from legendary times down to the time of Confucius, also known as 尚書經|尚书经[Shang4 shu1 jing1], 尚書|尚书[Shang4 shu1], 書|书[Shu1]
Song of the Southern dynasties 南朝宋 (420-479), with capital at Nanjing
Zou Yan (305-240 BC), founder of the School of Yin-Yang of the Warring States Period (475-221 BC)
the Spring and Autumn (770-476 BC) and Warring States (475-221 BC) periods
